ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 15 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF-S 55-250mm II IS Lens + <3> Samyang 500mm Telephoto Lens +
<4> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card + <5> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <6> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <7> Rokinon 67" Monopod & Case +
<8> PD Laptop/Tablet DSLR Backpack + <9> 67mm UV Filter + <10> 58mm UV Filter + <11> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit +
<12> LCD Screen Protectors + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> T Mount for Canon EOS + <15> Instruction Sheet for T-Mount
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 70D Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-135mm IS STM Lens with 55-250mm IS & 500mm Lenses + 32GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Filters + Monopod + Flash + Kit
